name: Raw Cocoa, Nut & Berry truffles
recipeIngredient: 4 tbsp whiskey (you cal also use dark rum, any other spirit or just plain water)
2 tbsp coconut oil, at room temperature
4 tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder (we used lake champlain)
1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder (we used lake champlain)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak goji berries in bourbon and water until softened, about 5 minutes. Drain and discard liquid
Combine the soaked goji berries, cherries, dates, coconut oil and almond milk in a food processor Pulse a few times to form a rough paste
Add unsweetened cocoa powder and salt and pulse again until well combined. Transfer to a glass bowl.
Add hemp seeds, chia, cocoa nibs, walnuts and cashew meal. Mix well using a spatula or your hands. Refrigerate for 15 minutes
Working with approximately 2 teaspoons at a time, form the truffles and refrigerate them while you prepare the drizzle.
To make the drizzles, combine chocolate chunks and coconut oil in a bowl, and melt in the microwave at 20 second increments.
Roll the truffles in unsweetened cocoa powder and drizzle with melted chocolate
